letters.description: Identify the client's fertility goals, challenges, medical history, and support systems.
Provide evidence-based information on fertility, reproductive health, treatment options, and lifestyle factors.
Develop personalized strategies for managing stress, improving nutrition, optimizing lifestyle, and navigating medical appointments.
Implement specific coaching techniques (e.g., mindfulness, visualization, CBT) to address emotional and behavioral barriers.
Facilitate exploration of values, beliefs, and coping mechanisms related to fertility and parenthood.
Collaboratively define measurable outcomes and track progress towards the client's fertility goals and overall well-being.
